casebody.data:
INNOVENTION TOYS, LLC, petitioner,
v.
MGA ENTERTAINMENT, INC., et al. No. 15-635. Supreme Court of the United States June 20, 2016.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and *2484case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Halo Electronics, Inc. v. Pulse Eletronics, Inc., 579 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1923, --- L.E.2d ---- (2016).
